credit_line: Gift of Arthur J. Waterman, Class of 1928
title: Kesa (priest robe), Shinshu sect
description: orange ground with dragons and flowers, six brocade squares, white ground with gold and multicolor floral designs added, orange silk backing
inscriptions: verso in ink on cloth label: GINYAKE/ BROCADE/ SHIN SHU SECT/ PRIEST ROBE/ MADE IN JAPAN/ P.1799.A.D./ K.N.
